item.title: Post office / Royal mail fiasco
item.description: I was sending a letter to Slovenia as I have done so, oh so many times through the local Post Office. This time I was also returning a book to Amazon at the same time and I only later realised that I was given a »certificate of sending« for the book I was returning and not for the letter. I went back and received a hand-written “copy”. OK, thought nothing of it and forgot all about it …
